descr: "Represents a request for a patient to employ a medical device. The device may be an implantable device, or an external assistive device, such as a walker."

fields.name: resourceType
fields.descr: "This is a DeviceRequest resource"

fields.name: identifier
fields.descr: "Identifiers assigned to this order by the orderer or by the receiver."

fields.name: definition
fields.descr: "Protocol or definition followed by this request. For example: The proposed act must be performed if the indicated conditions occur, e.g.., shortness of breath, SpO2 less than x%."

fields.name: basedOn
fields.descr: "Plan/proposal/order fulfilled by this request."

fields.name: priorRequest
fields.descr: "The request takes the place of the referenced completed or terminated request(s)."

fields.name: groupIdentifier
fields.descr: "Composite request this is part of."

fields.name: status
fields.descr: "The status of the request."

fields.name: _status
fields.descr: "Extensions for status"

fields.name: intent
fields.descr: "Whether the request is a proposal, plan, an original order or a reflex order."

fields.name: priority
fields.descr: "Indicates how quickly the {{title}} should be addressed with respect to other requests."

fields.name: _priority
fields.descr: "Extensions for priority"

fields.name: codeReference
fields.descr: "The details of the device to be used."

fields.name: codeCodeableConcept
fields.descr: "The details of the device to be used."

fields.name: subject
fields.descr: "The patient who will use the device."

fields.name: context
fields.descr: "An encounter that provides additional context in which this request is made."

fields.name: occurrenceDateTime
fields.descr: "The timing schedule for the use of the device. The Schedule data type allows many different expressions, for example. \"Every 8 hours\"; \"Three times a day\"; \"1/2 an hour before breakfast for 10 days from 23-Dec 2011:\"; \"15 Oct 2013, 17 Oct 2013 and 1 Nov 2013\"."

fields.name: _occurrenceDateTime
fields.descr: "Extensions for occurrenceDateTime"

fields.name: occurrencePeriod
fields.descr: "The timing schedule for the use of the device. The Schedule data type allows many different expressions, for example. \"Every 8 hours\"; \"Three times a day\"; \"1/2 an hour before breakfast for 10 days from 23-Dec 2011:\"; \"15 Oct 2013, 17 Oct 2013 and 1 Nov 2013\"."

fields.name: occurrenceTiming
fields.descr: "The timing schedule for the use of the device. The Schedule data type allows many different expressions, for example. \"Every 8 hours\"; \"Three times a day\"; \"1/2 an hour before breakfast for 10 days from 23-Dec 2011:\"; \"15 Oct 2013, 17 Oct 2013 and 1 Nov 2013\"."

fields.name: authoredOn
fields.descr: "When the request transitioned to being actionable."

fields.name: _authoredOn
fields.descr: "Extensions for authoredOn"

fields.name: requester
fields.descr: "The individual who initiated the request and has responsibility for its activation."

fields.name: performerType
fields.descr: "Desired type of performer for doing the diagnostic testing."

fields.name: performer
fields.descr: "The desired perfomer for doing the diagnostic testing."

fields.name: reasonCode
fields.descr: "Reason or justification for the use of this device."

fields.name: reasonReference
fields.descr: "Reason or justification for the use of this device."

fields.name: supportingInfo
fields.descr: "Additional clinical information about the patient that may influence the request fulfilment.  For example, this may includes body where on the subject's the device will be used ( i.e. the target site)."

fields.name: note
fields.descr: "Details about this request that were not represented at all or sufficiently in one of the attributes provided in a class. These may include for example a comment, an instruction, or a note associated with the statement."

fields.name: relevantHistory
fields.descr: "Key events in the history of the request."
